The jeans have a light wash and are distressed with rips and fading. They are perfect for everyday wear and can be dressed up or down.

name: High Waisted Ripped Skinny Jeans
description: These high-waisted skinny jeans feature a distressed look with rips at the knees. They are made from a soft and stretchy denim fabric that provides a comfortable fit. These jeans are perfect for a casual and trendy look.

name: High Waisted Straight Leg Pants
description: These high waisted pants are made of a smooth, lightweight fabric. They have a straight leg fit and a classic design that can be dressed up or down.

name: Light Wash Skinny Jeans
description: These light wash skinny jeans are a classic wardrobe staple. They are made from a soft and comfortable stretch denim that is perfect for everyday wear. The skinny fit hugs your legs and creates a flattering silhouette.

name: Checked Pants
description: These pants are made of a brown and beige plaid fabric with a slim fit and a straight leg. They have a zippered ankle detail and are perfect for a casual or smart casual look.

name: High Waist Straight Leg Jeans
description: These high-waisted straight leg jeans are a classic and versatile style that can be dressed up or down. They are made from a soft and comfortable denim fabric and feature a flattering straight leg silhouette. The high waist helps to create a slimming effect and the straight leg is perfect for all body types.

name: Light Blue Denim Shorts
description: Light blue denim shorts with a relaxed fit, pleats at the front, and a button closure. The shorts have a slightly distressed look and are made from 100% cotton.

name: Striped Linen Pants
description: These wide-leg pants are made from lightweight linen and feature a classic stripe pattern. They have a relaxed fit and a high waist, making them perfect for warm weather.

name: Sleeveless V-Neck Blouse with Tie
description: This sleeveless blouse features a V-neckline and a tie detail at the front. The fabric is lightweight and flowy, making it perfect for warmer weather. The blouse can be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion.
occasion: everyday wear, date night, formal event

name: Black Leggings
description: These are basic black leggings made from a soft and stretchy fabric. They have a high-waisted fit and are perfect for everyday wear.

name: Slim-Fit Trousers
description: These slim-fit trousers are made from a lightweight and comfortable fabric. They feature a classic design with a straight leg and a mid-rise waist. The trousers are perfect for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to more formal events.

name: Star Print Jeans
description: Light blue denim jeans with a  star print in orange, pink, and navy blue.

name: Leather Leggings
description: These black leather leggings are a wardrobe staple. They are made from high-quality leather and have a sleek and stylish design. The leggings are fitted and feature a high waist. They are perfect for dressing up or down.

name: Red Skinny Jeans
description: These are a pair of red skinny jeans. They are made of a stretchy denim fabric and have a high rise waist. The jeans are a slim fit and have a cropped length.

name: Distressed Boyfriend Jeans
description: These distressed boyfriend jeans feature a relaxed fit and a light blue wash. They are made from 100% cotton denim and have several rips and tears throughout. The jeans are cuffed at the hem and have a button closure.

name: Pleated Linen Shorts
description: These light blue linen shorts feature a pleated front, a high waist, and a relaxed fit. They are perfect for warm weather and can be dressed up or down.

name: Basic Leggings
description: These basic leggings are made from a soft and stretchy fabric that is comfortable to wear all day long. They have a high waist and a slim fit. They can be dressed up or down, making them a versatile piece for your wardrobe.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Women's Red Riding Pants
description: These women's riding pants from Polo Ralph Lauren are a classic and stylish option for equestrian enthusiasts. Made with a durable and comfortable fabric, they feature a flattering slim fit and a classic red color. The pants also have a variety of functional details, including a zippered pocket, belt loops, and a signature Polo Ralph Lauren logo on the back.

name: Distressed Skinny Jeans
description: These skinny jeans feature a classic blue wash with distressed details at the knees and thighs. They have a slim fit that hugs the legs and a mid-rise waist.

name: Distressed Denim Jeans
description: These distressed denim jeans feature a light wash with multiple rips and tears throughout the legs. They have a classic five-pocket style with a button fly closure.

name: Re/Done 90s High Rise Denim Shorts
description: These are high rise denim shorts with a relaxed fit. The shorts are distressed with frayed edges and have a light wash denim color.

name: Black Zipper Detail Pants
description: These black pants feature a zipper detail on the front, a slim fit, and a comfortable stretch fabric. They are perfect for everyday wear, casual outings, or even dressing up for a night out.
occasion: Everyday wear, Casual outings, Date night

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Women's Riding Pants
description: These riding pants are made from a durable and comfortable stretch cotton blend. They feature a slim fit, a zip fly closure, and two front pockets. The pants also have a reinforced knee patch for added durability.

name: Printed Denim Shorts
description: These shorts are made of denim with a gray and white geometric print. They have a classic five-pocket design and a slightly relaxed fit.
